MizoPol is a `Python` package written by **Mazen Alamir**, research director at CNRS, Grenoble, France.

Visit the author's website [website](https://www.mazenalamir.fr) for more details regarding his research topics. 
For any comment and/or suggestions, feel free to <a href="#" onclick="location.href='mailto:mazen.alamir@grenoble-inp.fr'; return false;">
  contact him directly.
</a>
:::

:::

- understanding your data, 
- discovering relationships,
